entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
